titles.title: Public Housing Rehabilitation Equity Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to facilitate the rehabilitation of public housing using the low-income housing credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Public Housing Rehabilitation Equity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the low-income housing credit available for the rehabilitation of public housing.
